name: Uptown Treehouse
tagline: Bringing brands closer to their roots.
description:
Uptown Treehouse is a full service marketing agency that helps brands meet their goals by leveraging social media and digital channels to reach current and potential customers. We help with all marketing activities including exposure, engagement, feedback and customer service.
We look at each brand separately to analyze their unique situation and then recommend & implement a distinct solution that leverages existing platforms like Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, Foursquare, mobile etc.
